website_summaries.verdict: An affordable outlet-powered electric pump from a trusted brand. Blows inflatables up in record time, making it especially useful for impromptu sleepovers and pool parties.
pros: Powerful motor inflates a full sized airbed in mere minutes
Lightweight, compact design is easy to handle
Comes with multiple valve adapters to fit a wide variety of inflatables
Backed by a 1 year limited warranty
cons: A longer power cord wouldn't hurt

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Got this beg of Jan and it worked great! We couldn't believe how quickly it inflates and deflates and how long it holds a charge. 6 months later and it will not hold a charge at all. Not for one second. Glad we discovered this prior to our next camping trip or we would have been in trouble! We are contacting Coleman and Amazon, so I will update accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Sucks! Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy a air mattress pump that will do the job 100 times faster and better. This pump is terrible. Dies out after a few minutes of use. Like seriously? How can you blow anything up?!? So annoying. Oh and it doesn't work plugged in. Like wth! Literally took me 2 days to blow up a small inflatable pool for my daughter. I did half one day and half the other. How pathetic! My neighbor came over with an air mattress pump and within a few short minutes my daughters pool was inflated. Piece of junk this pump is. Save your time and money. So annoyed that I can't send it back.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: First use...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, was charged right out of the box but because we were going to be gone for a week I charged it for 8 hours.... Used it to fill the queen Size Coleman mattress from empty and 3 re inflation's during the week with no issues - Still had juice in it to deflate the bed... I store it in the house instead of the trailer and check power each month - so far so good! Update 2020- Still working like a champ, goes camping with us several times a year and has not failed to inflate and has not gotten any louder with age the way some items do...
customer_reviews.author: Red Badger

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS LEAD. Would NOT recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, fast. Only issue I had was the fact that the power cable has lead and "wash your hands" and "cancer warning" tags all over it. Had I known that, I wouldn't have even considered purchasing this product in the first place. I double wrapped the cord with electrical tape to lessen exposure, but that's still just a bandage for a bigger issue.

customer_reviews.title: Nice air pump
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty good 12v type. Filled up six camping mattresses fairly quick. The filler nipples were not tight on each mattress so I improvised with another attachment from another set and used hand to seal around filler hole. Each mattress had different holes but the pumped worked. I did purchase a 12' extension cord for the 12v , it comes with a decent length cord but the extension reached to tent
customer_reviews.author: bob d

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This handheld worked like a charm. I do see what some people were talking about, wishing that the power button had some kind of lock mechanism as it did turn on in the bag in the trunk. Luckily I heard it almost immediately and was able to turn it off. We have a very active lake lifestyle so blowing up tubes and rafts takes a lot of time when we get to the lake, this made my life sooooo much easier! It blew up & deflated 2 large float tubes, 1 floating armchair, several rings and a raft. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Workaholic

customer_reviews.title: Battery needs to be on a trickle charger when not in use
customer_reviews.text: The battery HAS to be kept on a trickle charging charger after charging, if not the battery will not hold a charge for more than a week. I’ve replaced 2 batteries because of this. I ended up soldering a charging lead to it directly so I can plug it into my charger and keep it on a trickle charge until I need it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, works ok when away from the car or electric
customer_reviews.text: This works good for blowing up rafts on the go. It’s a little on the slow side though and also seems like it only blows up so much before you have to use a manual pump to air up a raft to full capacity. It’s a great pump for getting the party started and less work than a manual pump. It works great for deflating tubes. It blew up one kayak, 3 river tubes and a cooler raft before it ran out of power.
customer_reviews.author: Zing Zong

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first but lost ability to hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: Used on one 2-week camping trip and did fine (charged a couple times in campsite bathrooms). Put it away for 6 months, brought it out and charged it for a trip and ended up sleeping on the ground because it doesn’t hold a charge anymore. It will turn on strong at first and go full speed for about 30 seconds and then slowly dies down to nothing in the next minute. Filled a full-sized mattress only 1/3 of the way full on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to inflate some inflatable tubes this past weekend. It worked great! The motor is super powerful and the tips worked great when filling various size valves. Some were like a beach ball and some were sort of like a smaller air mattress hole. I did not use it to uninflate the tubes as we were at the river where there were no outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Evans

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle attachments are not connected to each other via cord for handiness
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this pump yet but have no doubt it will work as described. However I’m writing this review now because I am disappointed that the nozzle attachments, 2 of them, are not attached to each other via a small cord etc. Previous/other pumps have the attachments connected to each other some how so you don’t lose them. I have to imprevise to keep them both with the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coleman air pumps have gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how loud this thing is. You will absolutely need to get earplugs prior to using this. That said it does inflate pool inflatablesbut it takes three times longer than doing it yourself. As such I'm giving this a poor rating due to lack of quality and extreme noise. this also feels a lot cheaper than the Coleman air pump I purchased 20 years ago. very disappointed in the direction this company has gone and their quality assurance.
customer_reviews.author: Primal Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for awhile. Finally got around to buying one for camping trip this past weekend. We spend a lot of time in primitive camping so I really needed a pump that would work quickly as most battery pumps can take a very long time to finish the job. The Friday night it blew up our air mattress with no issue. On Sunday when breaking camp, I use the deflate option. Worked for two minutes and quit completely. Yesterday was Sunday the 18 was the last day I had to return it. So I guess I wont be getting my money back on an item that worked for 5 minutes. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya k

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pump
customer_reviews.text: I've had three of the rechargeable models over the last few years. They worked great for a while, but the problem was that the battery died after a couple of years and would not recharge. So I decided to get the corded model this time around. Yes, you have to plug it in, but this is not really a big deal, as long as your primary use is around the house. The corded model is lighter than the rechargeable and it also inflates faster. I'm betting that this one will still work for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for a blow-up pool
customer_reviews.text: After using a muscle powered pump a couple of times for the kids' pool, I decided that was for the birds and ordered this pump. It fills the pool up quickly, and can get it feeling nice and tight. I've had no issues with it yet, and I'm very glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: MattH007

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase! Everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.text: Was sick to death of using the one we have that has to be plugged into the car outlet. Bought this and so far have only used it for blow up mattresses at slumber parties and the occasional toy, but can't wait to rely on it all summer long for backyard pools and poolside toys! Love that you can blow it up and then use the reverse fan to suck it all out and put away! A necessity for any kid-friendly household.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Shea

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a year ago and used it once and put it away for storage until needed again. Tried to charge it and use it and its not working. I had it charge a full day and the next day still not working.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: The One We Got Is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Our old Coleman was fantastic and lasted years. This made a terrible noise from the very start and wouldn’t hold a charge about 1 month after we got it. I don’t give a bad review lightly but this is probably the worst thing we have ever purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Herd

customer_reviews.title: I'd would highly recommend this 120v pump if you have a source when ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd would highly recommend this 120v pump if you have a source when using your air mattress. It airs up a single high twin in about 15 seconds and a queen in about 30 seconds, depending on the pressure you want. I didn't feel it was worth a full star penalty, but future designs really need a more secure connection for the adapter. A simple lock notch or male/female dimple would be an improvement over the pinch concept that often comes free inside of transport bag. Would recommend to anyone on the market for an air mattress pump.
customer_reviews.author: M. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Good pump...cord is slightly shorter than would hope but not deal breaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this to inflate a commercial size whitewater raft. From the pickup truck cigarette lighter to the raft is just long enough. 2 ft more would have been very helpful, but it did the job as long as the raft was rotated to face the door. If your raft doesn’t have end mounted valves, you may want a extension. It gets it plenty firm enough for a tiny zinger substitute. 10 extra barrel pumps per chamber and it was good for an easy day.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Marrinan

customer_reviews.title: Nice little air pump
customer_reviews.text: This was a good investment. I purchased this to inflate some inflatable toys for my kids. This inflated a watermelon sprinkler and bump n run inflatables each only taking a few minutes. It is a little loud but thats to be expected but it inflated each item in a matter of minutes even when powered of the charge. I'm very impressed by the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Goobtube

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the initial time I used it, slower the second time. It no longer charges. It does not work when it is plugged in either.
customer_reviews.author: Rho

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but very good at filling. See desc
customer_reviews.text: With the largest hole adapter, I filled the 2 large rings in this huge pool, is 1.5 minutes, total: Intex Swim Center Inflatable Family Lounge Pool, 88in X 85in X 30in, for Ages 3+ The trick is to remove to use the filling ports without anything blocking the airflow. For the smaller chambers, you need to block open the release valve really well in order to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Fast Inflation - battery doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Coleman 4D battery air inflator too but didn't like how long it took to inflate our Queen-sized air mattress. This one seems a lot faster. You can tell that it is blowing much more air. It's nice to be free from electrical cords when camping in the wilderness. Update: Our Coleman QuickPump is not quite a year old and the battery is shot. We've tried to recharge it to no avail. I would NEVER recommend this product. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Waggener

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for deflating
customer_reviews.text: It works. Good for camping where there is no electricity. It holds the charge well enough to inflate and deflate 3 or more times. But, if there is electricity within an extension cord reach go for the air mattress with the switch to self inflate and deflate. This doesn't work so great for deflating. We still had to roll on the mattress and fold and roll and fold and roll to get all the air out.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Parker Baker

customer_reviews.title: The product doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The return window closed before I used it, so now I have a defective product I can not replace or return. The return window closed one day before I needed it on my camping trip. Never again will I buy or recommend Coleman
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Solar cells do not charge the battery!
customer_reviews.text: First I charged it overnight usin a wall charger and USB cable. All leds light. Disconnected from wall and connected to my phone. It gave my Galaxy 8 plus about a 35% charge.. Unplugged from phone. Left the unit in the bright Florida sun ( Solar cells up) for 8 hours. Leds show no charge. Not worth the money. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Memoli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump for the sole purpose of being able to inflate large pool floats when we go to different pools. I haven’t had it long so I can’t speak to the longevity of it, but for our purpose it has worked wonderfully. Blows up the obnoxiously large pool floats in just minutes with plenty of battery life. I only wish the charger had some sort of light on it to confirm it was charging or when it was fully charged. Other than that I am very happy with this rechargeable pump!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep it in the house when not in use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve burnt through 3-4 of these, one every year. The battery always seems to die when I go to use it the next year. I tried a different brand. Didn’t even last one summer. Here is the trick - keep it in your house. I always left them in the garage with all my camping gear in extreme temperatures. This last one has been good to me and seems like it will keep on going.
customer_reviews.author: Hamburger

customer_reviews.title: Won't Charge - 10/10 paperweight 0/10 Pump
customer_reviews.text: Came charged and wa able to use right away. That is the only good thing about this pump. I was able to use it on the initial charge right up until the first charge ran out right after the return window. This pump can not hold a charge. I am dealing with Coleman to get it replaced. I would STRONGLY recommend you not purchase this product. It will leave you high and dry (literally as this was purchased to blow up a kiddie pool).
customer_reviews.author: Mike Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment for Pool Owners.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a time saver. Prior to purchasing this I was the one traveling back and forth from car to pool inflating floats. This thing is great we have it on the porch ready and waiting to inflate some floats. This is 2-3 faster than the car version and is easily held by hand. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not terribly noisy
customer_reviews.text: Works great, not terribly noisy. I needed it more for removing the air from a self inflating pad and it does that perfectly. Had to make my own adapter though as neither of the two it comes with would work... a buck fifty for some vinyl hose at ACE hardware and bam! it works!
customer_reviews.author: ZCyclesTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a blow up pool. At first I thought it would be a silly purchase because I'd only need it once to blow up the pool, but I find myself using it almost weekly since even the nicest pools lose air. It's a tiny but mighty pump and its size makes it easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: I recommend purchasing a 12V car charger extension cord
customer_reviews.text: It works. Brought it along to inflate two Queen size coleman air mattresses when car camping. It worked, but there were two issues: 1. noise. It is very loud. 2. the cord is very short. I recommend purchasing a 12V car charger extension cord, which is sold here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mega Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good power, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, holds a great charge. I charge it before a camping trip and use it several times to inflate and then deflate and it does great. Inflate a double high queen air mattress in just a few minutes, if that. Only thing is that the string holding the attachments didn't last. I have mine clipped on the handle so I don't loose them
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Tips keep flying off, blows hard
customer_reviews.text: Tips keep flying off the pump—even after I twist to lock them in place. This is not my first Coleman quick pump by any means but it’s the first I’ve experienced this with. I just used the new tips with my other car adapter Coleman pump (I lost those tips) and the tips fit on just fine and didn’t shoot off so it’s obviously the new pump that’s not shaped correctly:
customer_reviews.author: Oscarthegrouch1984

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I needed an electric pump for our inflatable pool. I was a little worried about some of the reviews stating it was slow and hot. It blew up our 72" x 112" pool in several minutes and the attachment was fine. I did have to hold it onto air valves but it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: MNMD

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have this Summer
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to blow up our air mattresses for camping and it's been great. Much better than our old heavy, battery operated coleman that finally fell apart. We've also been able to blow up a wubble ball and stoke a fire with it. Glad we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lew

customer_reviews.title: whaaaa happened?
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Coleman products! But I've only used this a few times and it's already broken. Darn. It was super noisy the last time we used it. My boyfriend said the bearings were installed wrong? Today when I tried to use it it was SUPER NOISY and wouldn't fill an air mattress. Bummed :( Maybe I just got a faulty one. Wouldn't mind a replacement if possible. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T.

customer_reviews.title: USEFUL/ EFFICIENT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this couple of months ago. Ever since, i have used it because of people visiting us when we moved to another state. It was easy to use and very efficient/quick. It was well made. but i wish they would have a longer cord and would make less noise (I was so startle when i first used it).. other than that.. if you want to have a basic pump for your airbeds.. this is a very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ng

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Little Pump!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump to inflate large water floats for the family to use on Bass Lake. This little pump inflated each of them in about 2 minutes! I was able to open the back window on my truck and put the cord through the window and blow them up right in the bed of my truck. Very easy and quick and off we went for a day on the lake!
customer_reviews.author: SLicK

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a battery powered pump for my air mattress. Got tired of always having to take the batteries in and out because I use it so infrequently. 99 percent of the time I have an outlet nearby. This is much more powerful as well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: D. Perryman

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pump because it was convenient and portable. We like to travel as a family, so having a portable pump was necessary for our blow up mattresses. Unfortunately, after a few months usage the motor has burnt out. When it was working, it was great, although that was short lived. I am not sure if this was a defect or just a poorly made product.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Annel

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more $ but get a lot in return.
customer_reviews.text: This thing blows air mattress up very fast. One charge will inflate 2 queen 18in beds, 1 twin 18 in bed, 2 queen 10in beds, and 6 floating tubes. My whole family goes camping several times during the summer, this last trip my mom said she was going to replace her intex one with this one since it is way more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use. Should work on any make or model air mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Inflates and deflates quickly and has attachments for all sorts of air mattress openings. Not too loud, wish it came with the ability to change out the plug to plug into a car or USB charger, can only plug into wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Free Advice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for beach bag. Powerful tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little pump you can throw in your beach bag with the attachments and take to the beach or water with you to blow up your wrath. So easy to use and maintains a charge for many hours. Also easily deflates any refs within minutes. Got many compliments on this and it’s so easy to use
customer_reviews.author: JOAN RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Faster than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is super fast for inflating n camping mattress and pool inflatables. I did find it was rather difficult to deflate the mattress as I had to actually push in against the opening while deflating; hence the four-stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: floridienne

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the rechargeable model to replace my old rechargeable pump after it died after about 5 years of use. Inflates and deflates my queen size air mattress in just a couple of minutes. I'm not sure how long it lasts on a full charge, but I can let several of my friends use it while we're camping without the battery dying. Update: I'm on my second one of these pumps and neither one will take a charge. Thinking that it was the charging cable I bought another cable. Nope. The cable is fine; it's the pump itself that just will not charge.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: MISSING ITEM!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible, i openned this product the day before im going camping and guess what? It Didnt bring the charger that is supposed to be included! And stores are closed by now so i wont be able to use my brand new air bed and sleep on the freezing floor... didnt find a way to reach amazon or the seller about this via email or message like i have done in the past, amazon contacts me and fix this ill change my review!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Almanzar

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for the first few months. I stopped using it for a while and then a few months ago I charged it overnight and it didn't turn on. This thing is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Works. Cordless / Car option would be nice in one unit.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Just wish you didn't have to decide between three different models in order to get battery power or car power into this thing. Was hoping for a single solution for home and camping... but it is what it is. We have a vehicle inverter anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JLJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and now I don’t have to worry about having batteries on hand. Right out of the box it was already charged enough that I could use it to inflate a queen size mattress & twin & then deflate them both.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Perez

customer_reviews.title: A1, High performance, Value
customer_reviews.text: This pump delivers some serious inflation power! I would highly recommend this product. Sounds like a vacuum cleaner but inflates my queen sized air mattress in seconds! Inflates way faster then expected! Love it! For the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazo-Geek

customer_reviews.title: Won't completely fill a mattress firm. You will be unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how this got a high ratings, it takes forever to fill an air mattress. When it starts to get completely full it starts to stuttering and won't do that final push to make the mattress firm. Don't waste your money. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last more than one short season
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the one time I used it last season, now it is completely dead! Won't even attempt to putter out any air now...
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great pump! Used it this weekend And it pumped up my queen coleman air matress very quickly. Wish it came with a slot for batteries or something, because when i am camping i dont have a way to plug it in to an outlet. Just have to make sur eit is charged properly!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Received a replacement in 2 days Amazon is great but the second one stopped within 60 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one and it worked for 60-90 seconds then it stopped working. Received a replacement in 2 days Amazon is great but the second one stopped within 60 seconds. Deffective 2 in a row. When it worked for a min it was strong, loud but just stopped working real fast.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: You need this!!
customer_reviews.text: When you are tent camping or going on a fishing trip and want to inflate your Coleman airbed, this thing is what you need. Battery last long time with many uses. Its a little on the loud side, but its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Gray

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working altogether after no more than five uses
customer_reviews.text: We used this pump no more than five times in total and it has completely stopped working. Not that it won't hold a charge, it won't even charge to run the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas B

customer_reviews.title: Best pump EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pump out there. It fills up my River Rat tube in just over a minute! We use to pre-fill all the tubes with an air compressor at the house and then take multiple cars because the tubes took up a ton of space. Now we fill our tubes at the location in just over a minute each and we don't have to take so many cars. It is a little powerhouse!
customer_reviews.author: Mom 101

customer_reviews.title: this thing works great! I researched a lot of these
customer_reviews.text: As most have said, this thing works great! I researched a lot of these, and this seemed to be the best bang for buck, and now i can tell you it is. I blow up and deflate tubes every weekend and this cuts my time by at least 3/4! And the deflate is just as good as the inflate. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: whatsleft

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump last year and rarely use it. Use it mostly to inflate the kids pool in the summer time. Literally used it a handful of times last summer and now with in the last 2 months it's hit or miss if it charges or even turns on. Of course this started right out of the 1 year warranty this product has! Very disappointed, would not recommended this pump!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised - but switch could use redesign
customer_reviews.text: This pump is great. Works very fast. It is louder than I expected. Also, it would be nice if there was some sort of "lock" on the switch. I use this on my jet ski and it's very easy for something to bump into the switch, turning it on inadvertently. In the meantime, I'm just using a piece of electrical tape to hold the switch in place when not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: No Charging Light
customer_reviews.text: What kind of amateur product is this? Yes it works, but they cut every corner they could to charge you 10x what it costs to make. How about making a good product Colman, not one to maximize profits. Give use some basic led charging lights, you can't afford that?????
customer_reviews.author: Pironio

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than a year. Will no longer hold charge. I had one before that lasted near a decade. Quality no there anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Campy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Used to inflate pool
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pool for the yard for the summer and our other mechanical pump took 45 minutes to inflate it. We ordered this one and it took about 10 minutes. Time saver and not as noisy as you'd expect, very compact also.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Rennock

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Product
customer_reviews.text: Takes a ridiculous amount of time in my opinion to inflate things. I used for two pool floats and honestly think a Coleman bike pump would have been faster. The fittings for inflation are okay but the design for attaching them is not very efficient and they seem a bit short for easy inflation. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: snich

customer_reviews.title: Beware of photos. They do not match description of the pump.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was ordering. Went with the photo description of item and did not notice that it did not represent pump. Worthless for my needs. Can't use unless it is plugged in and has very short cord. Hopefully I have learned a lesson regarding ordering from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hesseltine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This pump is easy to use and works well. My only issue is I wished there was one more size nozzle when I was blowing up a float one day. The one supplied didn't seem to want to fit well into the hole. Also it would be great to have an adapter to blow up basket/foot balls with. It is a nice pump overall and has been very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Only charged once then would not charge any longer. ...
customer_reviews.text: Only charged once then would not charge any longer. Even tried a new cord in case that was the issue. It was not.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful pump
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy to replace the battery operated pump we had with this one. You just plug in and charge for a couple of hours or longer depending how much it needs to charge. The pump is very powerful and so far works great. We are pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MV5

customer_reviews.title: Best pump
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pump. The first one lasted about 15 years before plug rusted out from saltwater. The pump still works but the plug need replacement. Great pump fast and powerful. We use it for large towables for behind the boat and air mattresses. I would not hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is rechargeable, multiple fittings, but loud
customer_reviews.text: I am "upgrading" from an older & smaller rechargeable pump. My use is air mattresses for camping. This has the staying power to pump up a large queen-sized deep pocket air mattress. Only one negative - it's REALLY LOUD. I am sure we would have rocks thrown at us if we tried to use it in the middle of the night while camping.
customer_reviews.author: April B

customer_reviews.title: Inflates floats and towables
customer_reviews.text: Works well. We use it to inflate towables on our boat. The pump seems to stop inflating when there is a certain amount of air pressure resistance, but works well for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Karmen Walter

customer_reviews.title: Cord too short
customer_reviews.text: The cord isn’t long enough to fill the mattress up. We have to put the mattress right by the truck to fill it up meaning we have to fill our mattress before we put it on the tent. Very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I took this for camping to use for my airbed and it worked great! It took me about 1-2 mins to inflate/deflate Coleman Dura rest queen airbed.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pump, was able to blow up baby pool and a few pool toys with ease. I would recommend spending the extra money on this rather than a cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: SV2331

customer_reviews.title: Well built, powerful, versatile pump
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more pleased with this pump. Lots of cheap junky pumps out there. I have an AC inverter, so bought the AC model and I can use it at home or in the car. Multiple adapter nozzles fit perfectly with the inflator stems on our float tubes. Powerful motor. Super fast inflation or deflation. Sturdy product seems like it will last a long time as other reviews indicate it probably should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Pressure a little low to push open a closed one way valve, but it'll fill volume nicely. great for the price. 14.99
customer_reviews.author: vinder

customer_reviews.title: 12 volt large volume, low pressure air pump
customer_reviews.text: works quickly and efficently to inflate an air mattress for sleeping when camping. Would reccomend to others and repurchase as needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: allan faust

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for almost a year! Very strong, would never go back to the pump that comes with the Coleman air mattress. Not to mention the cost of replacing batteries. I use on every camping trip to inflate/deflate 3 mattresses. And the pump does so flawlessly. We even have an inflatable raft we also inflate on every trip, and I never have to worry about recharging on the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Conigliaro

customer_reviews.title: I recommend highly to buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this on a 3 day camping trip. I was so suprised at how fast I aired up all our mattresses. It only took like 3 minutes to air up one Full size mattress. And it was so easy to use. I recommend highly. And it’s recharble, so we just kept it plugged in just in case!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda delp

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Bed Pump
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous one but with rechargeable batteries that worked great for years until they quit recharging, now, this model has no issues now or in the long term future.
customer_reviews.author: GMJM

customer_reviews.title: Quicker
customer_reviews.text: Inflates my extra tall camping air mattress quickly. Way better than my last pump. Hand pump was not an option with this air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little air pump
customer_reviews.text: Bought for blowing up air mattress since our other Coleman one didn't work anymore, which we had that one for 18 yrs. We also use this for blowing up our innertubes for the lake.
customer_reviews.author: special k

customer_reviews.title: Works great and holds a charge!
customer_reviews.text: I see others might have some small complaints that might be due to product runs that were not good or a personal bad luck experience. As for myself, the unit I received has held up very nicely in terms of holding a charge... longevity of the charge and overall well-performing unit. I've had it now for over a year and have used it on many camping trips. We use it to inflate and deflate our air mattresses. I'm very happy with the device.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: not for inflatable boat
customer_reviews.text: Pro: it inflates fairly fast compare to manual pumping. con: 1. no battery indicator, so no way to tell how much juice left. 2. cannot build of pressure, i have to finish with manual pump for my inflatable boat/seat. 3. noise are high
customer_reviews.author: Tris P

customer_reviews.title: Replaced an old pump that finally gave up the ghost
customer_reviews.text: Of course you're supposed to plan ahead but I didn't check out my air mattress until a few days prior to departing on my camping trip. Battery in old pump wouldn't take a charge. Amazon prime to the rescue! Pump arrived the night before departure as promised. Works just as advertised. Can't speak to the durability yet but if it lasts as long as my previous Coleman rechargeable battery powered pump I'll be too old to get up off the air mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Burns

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Tried out the item and returned. It's not powerful for airbed or inflatable kayaks. In the end, hand pump need to be used to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: Update: My satisfaction and excitement was shortlived, as it appears this pump will not re-charge, even though is listed as rechargeable. What a shame. Original Review. A life saver. I went camping and the guy with an inverter for the electrical pump had told me I was wasting my money on this. Well when we arrived to the campground his little inverter didnt work and my pump was used to inflate at least 9 airbeds on a single charge. I was the hero of the camping trip thanks to this little baby. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Quick fill/not a good battery pack
customer_reviews.text: Filled queen mattress in just a few minutes and deflated with ease when done but battery won't keep a charge after 6 uses? Had to use hand pump to fill queen mattress after pump started dying after 15 seconds in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: buyer1

customer_reviews.title: Must have for camping
customer_reviews.text: Air mattresses go bad so quickly that it's not worth buying the one with the pump in it. I just buy the cheapest ones and use this pump it has worked great for all our camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT WEIGHT PUMP
customer_reviews.text: I needed N air pump to fill up my inflatable mattress Easy to use and inflates the mattress fast. Recommend for your air mattress
customer_reviews.author: faith1226

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first then died
customer_reviews.text: I had this working great for about 6 months and then I thought it was just not charged. Nope, after the winter season it still wasn't charged and just stopped working. I am very upset because I really did like it, however it's not worth it for only 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: TMoney

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these, and it died after a couple months of barely using it. It wasn’t dropped or damaged physically in any way. Struggling to find another rechargeable air pump, I decided to give one more a chance. Same exact thing happened after a few weeks. It’s a complete piece of garbage. Do not waste your money. It won’t work even if it is plugged in. The battery won’t hold a charge either, so it is completely useless. Coleman should pull this product off of the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ross C Patton

customer_reviews.title: Good power but cord is way too short
customer_reviews.text: Good power but cord is way too short. Was not able to blow beds up in tent had to be carried to and from car.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Quick filling, lightweight, but a little loud
customer_reviews.text: We got this to inflate a Coleman air mattress for camping. It works well and filled the air mattress quickly. It is fairly lightweight and not bulky, so was easy to carry along. It is a little loud, but that's reasonable considering it's other pros. We have not yet tried it out on other inflatables, but it came with different nozzles, so we are hopeful it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FAST PUMP
customer_reviews.text: Great pump. Works super fast only thing is it's super loud other than that great amazing product. Inflated my queen couch bed in under 10 mins!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Air bed pump on steroids
customer_reviews.text: Toss the vacuum pump that came with your air bed in the trash. This pump works 10X better than any pump I’ve ever had. Well worth the investment as I always have friends and family staying at my house and sleeping on air beds.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Super Convenient and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but OH so convenient for both the road and the home. Just plug to charge (and you can use the pump while charging) and then take it on the go! One of my favorite amazon purchases. Can't verify how long the charge stays, but it worked well for 5-6 hours after I stopped charging (not consistently pumping).
customer_reviews.author: Karen Xavier

product_meta.title: Coleman QuickPump
product_meta.description: Inflate or deflate just about any airbed from your vehicle with a Coleman QuickPump 12V Pump. The Fast Inflate and Fast Deflate design gives you faster inflation than a leading competitors comparable pump. Just plug it into your car or boat outlet, connect it to the Double Lock valve, and watch this powerful pump get your airbed ready in no time. Additional adaptors also allow you to use the pump on Boston or pinch valves, so you can fill other common inflatables. When the fun is done, the pump also deflates your airbed for quicker storage.
feature_bullets: FAST INFLATION: Designed to work with virtually any air bed
VERSATILE: Included Boston and pinch valve adapters let you inflate other common inflatables

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
